alert.note: Alert for Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 9:15PM CDT until July 14 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WILL...DUPAGE AND CENTRAL COOK COUNTIES... At 915 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Burr Ridge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Naperville, Bolingbrook, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Wheaton, Downers Grove, Elmhurst, Lombard, Bartlett, Carol Stream, Romeoville, Plainfield, Hanover Park, Addison, Glendale Heights, Elk Grove Village, St. Charles, Woodridge and Glen Ellyn. This includes... Argonne National Laboratory, Brookfield Zoo, Benedictine University, College of DuPage, DuPage County Fairgrounds, Lewis University, Moraine Valley Community College, Morton Arboretum, Wheaton College, and North Central College. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 260 and 282. I-88 between mile markers 121 and 140. I-290 between mile markers 5 and 19. I-355 between mile markers 2 and 30. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
